cv.summary: Java/J2EE software engineer. Information systems design and implementation. OOP. N-tiers architectures. RDBMS/SQL. Design patterns. UML. RUP, agile software development. Experience in the industrialization of development processes. European education. Master degree in Computer Science. 5 years of international experience (projects for IT-consulting, insurance and software companies). 21 IT-certifications from Brainbench system. Fluent french, good english, russian and ukrainian - native speaker. Purposeful and responsible. Professional ambition - become a software architect.

organisation.name: Teamlog Institute
organisation.speciality: Professional courses organized by Teamlog Institute.

organisation.name: University Paris-Est Marne-la-Vallée
organisation.desc: DESS « Communication, Network, Image », section Network (actual Master CS).

organisation.name: Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers (CNAM)
Ukrainian State University of Chemical Engineering
organisation.desc: Master Degree in Computer Science, with honour (2004).

company.name: Open-Groupe (Teamlog)
company.jobDesc: Participation in the design, development and management of the IT-projects (some on offshore mode). Architecture development, solving critical technical problems. Setup project infrastructure: SVN, builds, unit tests, Mantis, etc. Code revue. Participation in industrialization of IT-projects development(continuous integration, design/code quality, metrics, software factory). Conducting the technical interviews. Responsible for communication with customers. Technical audit for Java/J2EE projects (ISO-9126, Sonar, PMD, Cobertura, Metrics, SourceMonitor).
company.technologiesList: Java/J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Quartz, Struts, JUnit, Servlets/JSP, JAAS, JAXB, decompiler JAD, MySQL, LDAP, Ant, Maven, TeamCity, DBUnit, Linux, RPM, PowerDesigner, Redmine+Mylyn.

company.name: DVK-Tech
company.jobDesc: Java/J2EE consulting and development for different companies. The list of projects done with DVK-Tech is presented below and marked by ***.

company.name: Générali
company.jobDesc: Development of Java-based enterprise server. Technical design and implementation of different integration modules for connecting externs information systems. The development process is based on some industrial standards of the software building.
company.technologiesList: JAVA/J2EE, EJB, application server WebSphere 6.1, Oracle, SQL, MyEclipse, Rational Rose, UML. Advanced using of SQL language.

company.name: SMI-Mutuelle
company.jobDesc: Audit of a web-application that represents the company business workflow. Analysis and documentation of the existing architecture with further recommendations for optimisation and evolution. Writing the technical documentation describing the development environment and deployment process.
company.technologiesList: Java/J2EE, Servlet, Java Service Wrapper, Winstone, Oracle 8; UML diagrams.

company.name: Mondial-Assistance
company.jobDesc: Participation in the design and development of « e-commerce » projects. Persistence layer has been implemented with Hibernate and JDO (XCalia implementation). Bridge between business logic and presentation layer was developed according to MVC pattern on Struts framework. Web GUI-components development with AJAX. Architecture design and implementation of different application modules. Implementation of business logic layer.
company.technologiesList: Java/J2EE, Struts 1.3, Hibernate 3.0, JDO (Xcalia implementation), Servlet/JSP, JSTL, Tomcat 5.5, MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, FreeMaker, Common-Controls, many librairies from Jakarta Commons.

company.name: Web Agency DUKE
company.jobDesc: Design and realization of web site "back-office" solutions based on 3-tier architecture; persistence, business object layer (POJO), deployment ; logging, security and emailing modules. Developing of the security module for a web-application with Tomcat container managed security. Persistence layer implemented only with DAO's based on pure JDBC API. Programming the java-façades for Flash-based GUI-interface. Web GUI-components development with AJAX. Conception and realization of standalone application (server) aimed to survey the availability of internet sites. This application was developed with multithreading features as daemon for Linux Debian OS. Participation in projects architecture design.
company.technologiesList: Java/J2EE, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, Tomcat 5.5, MySQL 4.1, PostgreSQL, Log4j, Velocity, JSVC.

company.name: ISD - Information Systems Development
company.technologiesList: Application servers WebSphere and JBoss, RDBMS Oracle, Hibernate, Spring, JSF, JNDI.

company.name: LegitiName
company.jobDesc: Responsible for product evolution "SiteAudit". Specification and implementation of core project functionality. Preparing technical documentation.
company.technologiesList: Programming on framework .NET, language C#, WinForms, XML (XPath, XSD), ADO.NET, Microsoft SQL Server, librairies "Microsoft XMLDiff and XMLPatch 1.0" and "HtmlAgilityPack" by Simon Mournier.

technology-domain.name: Operating systems
technology-domain.itemsList: Mac OS X; MS Windows; Linux.

technology-domain.name: Java/J2EE
technology-domain.itemsList: Core Java (J2SE); Standards J2EE: application/web servers, JDBC, Servlets/JSP, JNDI, RMI, EJB, Web Services. Application/web servers : JBoss, WebSphere, Tomcat, Resin. Deep understanding of basis of distributed n-tier architecture: business objects (POJO and EJB), persistance, security issues, transactions, multithreading, logging. Java frameworks and librairies: Log4j, Spring, Struts, Hibernate, Quartz, many sub-projets of Apache Commons, Velocity, iText, JSVC. XML (XSL, XPath, XSD), HTML(CSS, JavaScript). Unit testing with JUnit, TestNG and DBUnit, integration with Spring testing framework.

technology-domain.name: .NET

technology-domain.name: RDBMS

technology-domain.name: Tools

technology-domain.name: Industrialization
technology-domain.itemsList: Project Automation with Maven and Ant. XUnit - JUnit, TestNG, DBUnit. Automated acceptance test with Selenium. Code coverage with Cobertura. Continious integration servers - Hudson and TeamCity. Code quality metrics - Sonar, FindBug, PMD. Project mananagement, wiki, bug tracker - Redmine. Software factories.
